name: Nica Creative
description: Nica Creative is a freelance designer with a small creative agency based in Lancashire, who work with a variety of individuals and organizations to deliver innovative ideas and design solutions. They specializing in brand identity, print design, and website design. She provides graphic and web design services from brand identity to advertising, brochures, point-of-sale, packaging, website creation and more. Everything from a major campaign to posters for a local opticians window.
